fiftyone.mobile.detection.entities.stream

Class Pool

  • java.lang.Object
    • fiftyone.mobile.detection.entities.stream.Pool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisposable

    public class Pool
extends Object
implements IDisposable
    As multiple threads need to read from the Source concurrently this class provides a mechanism for readers to be recycled across threads and requests. Used by the BaseList of type T to provide multiple readers for the list. The DetectorDataSet must be disposed of to ensure the readers in the pool are closed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AtomicInteger readerCount
      The number of readers that have been created.
      private Queue<BinaryReader> readers
      List of readers available to be used.
      private SourceBase source
      A pool of file readers to use to read data from the file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Pool(SourceBase source)
      Constructs a new pool of readers for the SourceBase provided.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Disposes of the source ensuring all the readers are also closed.

      int getReadersCreated()
      The number of readers that have been created.
      int getReadersQueued()
      Returns The number of readers in the queue.
      void release(BinaryReader reader)

    • Field Detail

      • readers

        private final Queue<BinaryReader> readers
        List of readers available to be used.

      • source

        private final SourceBase source
        A pool of file readers to use to read data from the file.

      • readerCount

        private final AtomicInteger readerCount
        The number of readers that have been created. May not be the same as the readers in the queue as some may be in use.

    • Method Detail

      • getReader

        public BinaryReader getReader()
                       throws IOException
        Returns a reader to the temp file for exclusive use. Release method must be called to return the reader to the pool when finished.
        Returns:
        Reader open and ready to read from the temp file
        Throws:
        IOException

      • release

        public void release(BinaryReader reader)
        Returns the reader to the pool to be used by another process later.
        Parameters:
        reader - Reader open and ready to read from the temp file

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes of the source ensuring all the readers are also closed.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface IDisposable

        public int getReadersCreated()

        The number of readers that have been created.
